trans-unit.source: Enables communication between the host and the script engine.
trans-unit.target: 啟用主機和指令碼引擎之間的通訊。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new site.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的網站。

trans-unit.source: An assembly for this site.
trans-unit.target: 此站台的組件。

trans-unit.source: An assembly for this site.
trans-unit.target: 此站台的組件。

trans-unit.source: Debug information for this site.
trans-unit.target: 偵錯此站台的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Debug information for this site.
trans-unit.target: 偵錯此站台的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Sets an assembly and debug info for this site.
trans-unit.target: 設定此站台執行組件和偵錯資訊。

trans-unit.source: An assembly to be set.
trans-unit.target: 若要將組件。

trans-unit.source: Debug info object to be set.
trans-unit.target: 偵錯設定資訊物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to an event source previously added to a script engine using the <xref:Microsoft.Vsa.IVsaCodeItem.AddEventSource*> method.
trans-unit.target: 取得事件來源先前已加入至指令碼引擎使用的參考<xref:Microsoft.Vsa.IVsaCodeItem.AddEventSource*>方法。</xref:Microsoft.Vsa.IVsaCodeItem.AddEventSource*>

trans-unit.source: The specified item name.
trans-unit.target: 指定的項目名稱。

trans-unit.source: The specified event source name.
trans-unit.target: 指定的事件來源名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns the event source to the engine.
trans-unit.target: 將事件來源傳回至引擎。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a global item, such as the host-provided application object.
trans-unit.target: 取得全域項目，例如主機提供的應用程式物件的參考。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a global item, such as the host-provided application object.
trans-unit.target: 取得全域項目，例如主機提供的應用程式物件的參考。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to the global object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回全域物件的參考。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the host about events generated by the script engine.
trans-unit.target: 通知主機有關指令碼引擎所產生的事件。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the host about events generated by the script engine.
trans-unit.target: 通知主機有關指令碼引擎所產生的事件。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the host about events generated by the engine.
trans-unit.target: 通知主機有關引擎所產生的事件。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the host about how to respond to compiler errors encountered by the script engine.
trans-unit.target: 通知主機如何回應指令碼引擎所遇到的編譯器錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Vsa.IVsaError> object representing the offending error.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Vsa.IVsaError>物件，代表違規錯誤。</xref:Microsoft.Vsa.IVsaError>

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if the compiler is directed to continue reporting further errors to the <xref:Microsoft.Vsa.IVsaSite> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果編譯器導向繼續報告進一步錯誤，則傳回 TRUE<xref:Microsoft.Vsa.IVsaSite>物件。</xref:Microsoft.Vsa.IVsaSite>

trans-unit.source: Returns FALSE if the compiler is directed to stop reporting further errors to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_IVsaSite" name="IVsaSite" href=""></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果編譯器導向停止報告進一步錯誤，則傳回 FALSE <xref uid="langword_csharp_IVsaSite" name="IVsaSite" href=""> </xref>物件。
